title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 580.7 - Abandoned vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 580.7 - Abandoned vehicles

State Regulations

It is a violation of the New York State Vehicle and

Traffic Law to abandon a vehicle. In the absence of specific permission by the
administration, all vehicles owned or under the control of a student must be
removed from the campus prior to the beginning of the Christmas and Easter
recesses and, of course, prior to the end of the school year. Violators may be
prosecuted under the State law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
580.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
